data.text:
@PoliticusSarah It's always very confusing when legislators keep shifting the playing field when discussing budgets and funding, but you always count on Republicans to say NAY to anything that doesn't put money in THEIR pockets.
https://t.co/YVHqARnbXU
@PoliticusSarah She signs like a 2nd grader. Probably so Republicans know who's signing.
@PoliticusSarah Holy crap! There's too many DC politicians who are just *horrible* people. They make Mr Potter look like Mother Teresa. https://t.co/n52DpHQAbF
